summary: A collection of armors based on an Oblivion mod Ageha Tortured Soul
descriptionHtml:
[color=#FF0000][b] ***WARNING - Read the requirements section!*** [/b][/color]

Description:
-----------------

This is a collection of armors based on the Ageha Tortured Soul mod from Davidcho for Olbivion. 
So far it contains one custom made armor and two original ones. More are on the way. For spoilers see To Do list below.

MrKrossFaith made a short video of the Heavy Walker, so check it out in the vid section or at the bottom!

Features:
-------------
Ageha Heavy Walker Armor, Gauntlets and Boots - Heavy Armor crafted at any Forge from Daedric section (no perk restriction)
Ageha Abyss Walker Armor, Gauntlets and Boots - Heavy armor Daedric section - shows more skin so less protection *howgh*
Ageha Mage Outfit unenchanted - Clothing crafted from Misc section
6 Ageha Mage enchanted versions with stats supporting each of the magic schools. (due to descriptions you can\'t see stats, check your Powers to see buffs)

Requirements:
--------------------

Caliente\'s female body http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/2666

And as it uses breast bones you will need a compatible skeleton!
Either CHSBHC http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/4888
          - Only install all skeletonfiles and animations if you want a bounce to your chest. Do not install textures or femalebody files.
Or Xp32 Maximum Skeleton http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/26800

Recommended:
---------------------

Race menu http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/29624/
I really recommend this mod. Especially if you want to customize your chest size. To my surprize this mod works with it without issues to extreme settings small or large!


Tip:
-----

Do you know Nifskope and how to use it? Then I\'ve got a good news for you. These armors contains many parts. Yes! Many! So you can remove some you don\'t like or combine them together yourself.

Installation:
----------------

Manual
1. Download manually
2. Unpack the content into your Skyrim folder with WinRar
3. Activate the esp.


Or download it via Nexus Mod Manager and activate.

Updates:
------------

0.94
- corrected materials needed for Heavy Walker Armor at the Forge
- added Ageha Abyss Walker Armor, Gauntlest and Boots
- added Ageha Mage armor and 6 enchanted variants

0.9
- initial release


To do list:
--------------

1. Finish Corruptor?... Certainly not with same features, sorry! (Unless someone would like to use it for a horror mod, but I will not post it here)
2. Add some chainmail suit variants for less naked version and improve boots and gloves.
3. Textures.... yes I know they are not great.
4. Conversion to UNP+B, CHSBHC
5. \"Reasonable Requests\" if time permits
6. Bug fixing of course.
7. A male version. No plans for that version at the moment.

Credits:
-----------

Davidcho - for the original oblivion mod
MrKrossFaith - for the video!
Nightasy - for his awesome tutorials that helped me along the way
Calienthe - for his great bodywork
Robin Scott - ... that is obvious. ;)
Bethesda - for their awesome games

Vids:
------

[youtube]-G1tAYBsGmw[/youtube]
